tool.name: SNP2HLA
tool.command:
##cd /home/mlibydt3/galaxy/tools && ##rm -fr snp2hla/temp_output/${name}* && ##rm -fr snp2hla/data/input/* && ## Make the target directory for input files mkdir -p snp2hla/data/input/ &&
## prep the input files from database folder to input folder ##bash $__tool_directory__/folder_path.sh $input_pbed snp2hla/data/input && ln -s ${input_pbed.extra_files_path}/* snp2hla/data/input/ &&
## run the script #if $subsets == 1 bash $__tool_directory__/snp2hla_galaxy_no_strat.sh $max_memory $window_size $name snp2hla/data/input/RgeneticsData \$ref_panel/T1DGC_REF plink SNP2HLA.csh snp2hla/temp_output #else bash $__tool_directory__/snp2hla_galaxy.sh $max_memory $window_size $name snp2hla/data/input/RgeneticsData \$ref_panel/T1DGC_REF plink SNP2HLA-fast.csh snp2hla/temp_output $subsets #end if && ## output files cp snp2hla/temp_output/${name}.bim "$output_bim" && cp snp2hla/temp_output/${name}.bed "$output_bed" && cp snp2hla/temp_output/${name}.fam "$output_fam" && cp snp2hla/temp_output/${name}.bgl.r2 "$output_r2" && cp snp2hla/temp_output/${name}.bgl.log "$output_log" && cp snp2hla/temp_output/${name}.out.dosage "$output_dosage"

param.name: name
param.label: Name for labelling output directory and files

param.name: max_memory
param.label: Maximum memory [MB]
param.help: Maximum memory in MB allowed for the process (max_memory)

param.name: subsets
param.label: Number of subsets
param.help: As a guidance, max 4000 samples per one subset. If a number of subsets equals to 1 then no subsetting occurs

param.name: input_pbed
param.label: pbed file
param.help: select 'Upload File' from top left tools menu, then click on 'Composite' tab, then upload bim, bed and fam files

tool.help: This tool imputes amino acids, HLA alleles, and SNPs in MHC region from SNP genotype data.
